entry.title: The Merge is a huge milestone, but Protocol researchers are still innovating. 🐠Goldfish by @jneu_net et al. is a provably secure variant of fork-ch...
entry.summary: The Merge is a huge milestone, but Protocol researchers are still innovating. 🐠Goldfish by @jneu_net et al. is a provably secure variant of fork-choice that could lead to an even more secure chain. Learn more 👇 Joachim Neu: The Merge is a monumental achievement But we don’t think PoS Eth will have reached its final form post-merge Introducing Goldfish 🐠, a provably secure variant of fork-choice that could lead to an even more secure chain 💪🧵 w/@fradamt @ErtemTas @dntse https://www.paradigm.xyz/2022/09/goldfish

entry.title: 📰 @CoinbaseInsto submitted a Maker Improvement Proposal (MIP) for @MakerDAO to deposit ~1.6B USDC from the PSM into a yield-bearing account to earn...
entry.summary: 📰 @CoinbaseInsto submitted a Maker Improvement Proposal (MIP) for @MakerDAO to deposit ~1.6B USDC from the PSM into a yield-bearing account to earn 1.5% APY as a part of Coinbase's Institutional Rewards Program. For more⬇️ MakerDAO Growth: .@CoinbaseInsto submitted a Maker Improvement Proposal (MIP) to transfer ~1.6B USDC from the PSM into a yield-bearing account in Coinbase Prime that will provide up to 1.5% APY on @MakerDAO's USDC holdings. ➡️ https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mipxx-coinbase-usdc-institutional-rewards/17703

entry.title: What is @RuneKek's vision for @MakerDAO? The Endgame Plan is a roadmap for how Maker aims to create an Unbiased World Currency by making $DAI "bitcoin...
entry.summary: What is @RuneKek's vision for @MakerDAO? The Endgame Plan is a roadmap for how Maker aims to create an Unbiased World Currency by making $DAI "bitcoin-like": ▶️ Decentralized ▶️ Intrinsically resilient ▶️ No changes to core system scope & complexity For more insight 👇 Ignas | DeFi Research: 1/ Maker's mission is to create an Unbiased World Currency. How? MakerDAO has an Endgame Plan for it 🧵

entry.title: 🏎A fast track for becoming an Ethereum core developer and researcher is now available through the @ethereum Protocol Fellowship (EPF). EPF is now a...
entry.summary: 🏎A fast track for becoming an Ethereum core developer and researcher is now available through the @ethereum Protocol Fellowship (EPF). EPF is now accepting applications for its 3rd cohort through September 16th.✨ For more details👇 Mario Havel: Welcome to the Ethereum Protocol Fellowship. The fast track to becoming an Ethereum core dev is now open! A fellowship program for anyone who is interested in diving deeply into core protocol research and development. EPF is now accepting applications: https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/09/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-third
